xsl:choose.xsl:when: https://scgi.v3.qa.ebay.com/saw/pics/

xsl:when.p:
The item you requested (
) is invalid or no longer in our database. Please check the number and try again. If this message persists, the item has expired and is no longer available.

Unfortunately, access to this particular category or item has been blocked due to legal restrictions in your home country. Based on our discussions with concerned government agencies and eBay community members, we have taken these steps to reduce the chance of inappropriate items being displayed. Regrettably, in some cases this policy may prevent users from accessing items that do not violate the law. At this time, we are working on less restrictive alternatives. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience this may cause you, and we hope you may find other items of interest on eBay.
Hit the return button to return to the previous page.

xsl:choose.xsl:when: Don't know browser type, please contact support@ebay.com!
xsl:choose.xsl:otherwise:
Input Error
One of the parameters received was invalid for this function. This probably means that your browser had problems with the form or you invoked the function incorrectly. Please go back and try again. If you're using an old bookmark, you may need to rebookmark it due to recent changes to protect your privacy. If the problem persists, please report the problem to eBay support@ebay.com.

xsl:if.p:
Details for the seller and high bidder(s):
The seller should contact the winning bidder(s) with information on the total cost, including shipping, and where to send payment. The winning bidder(s) must pay the seller directly for the item(s), and it is the seller's responsibility to fulfill the order when payment terms are met. The binding contract of the auction is between the winning bidder and the seller.

If the seller is unable to establish contact with the high bidder within 3 business days of the end of the auction, he/she may lose the place as winning bidder, and be at risk for receiving negative feedback and/or a Non-Paying Bidder warning, both of which can ultimately lead to suspension from eBay.

xsl:if.test: ebay[(Sale/IsBillpoint and Environment/@siteId = 0) or (Sale/IsBillpoint and Environment/@siteId = 3)] and not(Sale/IsCheckoutSupported)

xsl:if.p: To pay for this item, simply click the "Pay Now" button at the top of this page in the eBay Online Payments section.

p.b: If you're the seller or the winning bidder - now what?

tr.td: Winning Bidder: To ensure that your payment goes to the charity, you must use eBay Online Payments by Billpoint to pay for this item. Simply select the "Pay Now!" button above.

Seller: You should not need to contact the buyer. You will receive shipping instructions via email from eBay Online Payments by Billpoint once payment processing is complete (this may take up to 3 business days). You may not ask the buyer to pay via any method other than eBay Online Payments. This helps eBay ensure that Auction for America proceeds go to the designated charity. 100% of the proceeds for the item will be donated to the charity specified.
You will be reimbursed for shipping and handling costs if you specified these amounts in the Sell Your Item form under the eBay Online Payments Instant Purchase section. eBay will credit your account if applicable.

Leave feedback for the other party once the seller has received notification that payment processing is complete and the winning bidder has received the item.
Leave feedback to seller -
Leave feedback to bidder
Leave feedback to bidder

p.b: Details for the seller and winning bidder(s):

xsl:otherwise.p: The binding contract of the auction is between the winning bidder and the seller. If the winning bidder does not pay or contact the seller within 3 business days of the end of the auction, he/she may lose the place as winning bidder. In addition, the winning bidder may be at risk for receiving negative feedback and/or a Non-Paying Bidder warning, both of which can ultimately lead to suspension from eBay.

tr.td: Note: This is a Reserve Auction in which the reserve price was not met. Therefore, there is no transaction between the seller and the high bidder. Since there is no transaction, this item is not eligible for eBay services that protect buyers and sellers, such as transactional feedback, escrow or insurance. Those services are available only for items listed, bought and sold on eBay in compliance with our guidelines and policies.

xsl:when.b: If you're the seller or buyer - now what?

ol.li: Buyer:To ensure that your payment goes to the charity, you must use eBay Online Payments by Billpoint when paying for this item.

Seller:You should not need to contact the buyer. You will receive shipping instructions via email from eBay Online Payments by Billpoint once payment processing is complete (this may take up to 3 business days). You may not ask the buyer to pay via any method other than eBay Online Payments. This helps eBay ensure that Auction for America proceeds go to the designated charity. 100% of the proceeds for the item will be donated to the charity specified.
You will be reimbursed for shipping and handling costs if you specified these amounts in the Sell Your Item form under the eBay Online Payments Instant Purchase section. eBay will credit your account if applicable.

Leave feedback for the other party once the seller has received notification that payment processing is complete and the buyer has received the item.
Leave feedback for the other party.

xsl:when.p: Details for the seller and buyer:

The contract of this item is between the buyer and the seller. If the buyer does not pay or the seller is unable to establish contact with the buyer within 3 business days of the end of the item, he/she may lose the place as winner, and be at risk for receiving negative feedback and/or a Non-Paying Bidder warning, both of which can ultimately lead to a suspension from eBay.

ol.li:
Leave feedback for the other party
Once the the seller has received the payment and the buyer has received the item.
Leave feedback for the other party.
Details for the seller and buyer(s):
The seller should contact the buyers(s) with information on the total cost, including shipping, and where to send payment. The buyers(s) must pay the seller directly for the item(s), and it is the seller's responsibility to fulfill the order when payment terms are met.
This purchase contract is between the buyer and the seller. If the seller is unable to establish contact with the buyer within 3 business days of the end of the item, he/she may lose the place as winner, and be at risk for receiving negative feedback and/or a Non-Paying Bidder warning, both of which can ultimately lead to suspension from eBay.

xsl:if.p:
Seller - Want a safe, easy way to collect payment from the high bidder(s)?
To collect payment for this item using eBay Online Payments (a service provided by Billpoint), you can send the buyer a Billpoint Invoice

td.font:
Important: Only eBay Online Payments by Billpoint is accepted for this item. Learn more.
If you win this item you will receive an item of value for your payment, so you should assume that you will not receive any charitable deduction. If you want to contribute separately, please go to Auction for America: Cash Donations.

xsl:choose.xsl:when:
This is a binding auction
. By bidding, you are indicating that you will follow through the transaction in good faith if you win the auction.
xsl:choose.xsl:otherwise:
This is a non-binding auction
. By bidding, you are not entering into a contract to purchase this property. You are, however, expressing serious interest in the property and in pursuing contract discussions in the event you win the auction.

xsl:if.font:
Your bid is a contract
- Place a bid only if you're serious about buying the item. If you are the winning bidder, you will enter into a legally binding contract to purchase the item from the seller.

xsl:when.xsl:if: This is a Dutch Auction (Multiple Item Auction) - it features multiple quantities of an item. All winning bidders pay the same price - the lowest successful bid at the end of the auction. Dutch Auctions (Multiple Item Auctions) do not use proxy bidding.

xsl:otherwise.xsl:if: eBay will bid incrementally on your behalf up to your maximum bid , which is kept secret from other eBay users. The eBay term for this is proxy bidding .
